content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Transfer Station at Position (40.5, -83.5) to (42.5, -83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (40.5, -83.5) with inventory: {'coal': 800}
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) with warnings: ['chest at drop position is full. Empty the chest at (40.5, -83.5) to continue mining.']
- Burner Inserter at position (41.5, -83.5) with warnings: ['chest at drop position is full. Empty the chest at (40.5, -83.5) to continue mining.']
- Wooden Chest at position (42.5, -83.5) with inventory: {'coal': 144}

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (61.0, -54.0) with inventory: {'iron-plate': 57}
- Furnace at position (64.0, -53.0) with inventory: {'iron-plate': 52}
- Wooden Chest at position (61.5, -52.5) with inventory: {'coal': 5}
- Wooden Chest at position (62.5, -53.5) with inventory: {'coal': 5}
- Wooden Chest at position (62.5, -52.5) with inventory: {'coal': 5}

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors due to Full Inventory in Chests
- Ensure that the chests used for storing mined resources have enough space. Regularly check and clear the inventory of chests to prevent mining operations from halting.

### Errors with Inserters Waiting for Space
- Make sure that the destination chest for inserters has enough space to accept items. Regularly clear the destination chests to keep inserters functioning smoothly.

## NAMESPACE

- Utility functions: None defined.
- Important variables:
  - `inventory`: Dict[str, int] - Tracks the current inventory of the player.
  - `entities_on_map`: List[Entity] - Represents the current state of entities on the map.
